description: Custom CD template with precise measurements for printing

traseraAfuera.description: Back cover exterior (TRASERA_AFUERA) with two sections

traseraDentro.description: Back cover interior (TRASERA_ADENTRO) with two sections

frenteSection.description: FRENTE_AFUERA and FRENTE_DENTRO should be placed adjacent with no separation

discoSection.description: DISCO should be placed separately for easy cutting

traseraSection.description: TRASERA_AFUERA and TRASERA_ADENTRO should be placed adjacent with no separation

printingNotes: Maintain exact measurements for proper printing
Images will be cropped if they don't match the required aspect ratios
The center hole in DISCO should be indicated with a black circle or dotted line
Maximum of 3 CD templates per US Letter page
